changes.text: MP1.23_Pre seems to break playback.
With Server 3.9.5, episode lists are empty.
Added Last Air Date to Series & Groups.
Added support for Ares skin.
Optimize the number of parallel task.
Fix multiple issues when displaying star ratings.
After watching an episode, the episode overview remains empty.
Unable to set all episodes to "Unwatched" while in Episode list.
Fixed Unrecognized Files Order.
Fixed Worker Exception error when Banner & Filmstrip viewing mode.
Removed MAL.
Corrected import folder listing in config form.
Fixed incorrect sorting.
Fixed an issue with default group order when default group order is null.
Fixed an issue with fanarts not displaying correctly.
Removed Download UI.
Can now rate series manually from episode or series context menu.
Added log out option under switch user menu.
Added better approach to home navigation with custom parameters for expansion later (based on IR-Server-Suite).
fixed error handling for command actions (buttons / keys).
Fixed rating of series for all included skins.
Home button navigation fixed and improved (see new setting in configuration).
Additional improvements to Home screen navigation.
Small tweaks for filtering.
Fixed setting saving for HomeButtonNavigation.
Fixed settings reading of basic home setting.
Corrected import folder listing in config form.
Fixed incorrect sorting.
Fixed an issue with default group order when default group order is null.
Fixed an issue with fanarts not displaying correctly.
Removed Download UI.
Can now rate series manually from episode or series context menu.
Added log out option under switch user menu.
Added better approach to home navigation with custom parameters for expansion later (based on IR-Server-Suite).
Improved error handling for command actions (buttons / keys).
Home button navigation fixed and improved (see new setting in configuration).
Fixed rating of series for all included skins.
Added better approach to home navigation with custom parameters for expansion later (based on IR-Server-Suite).
Additional improvements to Home screen navigation.
Small tweaks for filtering.
Fixed setting saving for HomeButtonNavigation.
Fixed settings reading of basic home setting.
New skin (Avallanche) added.
Added new "Filters" option to left or right side menu depending on skin and moved Watched / local file display toggle from "Options" menu to it.
Cloud Support.
Added Mode and Start text keys for searching / filtering configurable via MA3 configuration window.
Additional check to make sure user can't set duplicate keys.
Added yes/no dialog before starting streaming playback.
Added delay stopwatch for KeyCommandHandler.
Added support for Trakt scrobbling.
Avalon skin corrections and alignment for series / episode info changed.
Increased series plot to 4 rows for episode view in StreamedMP skin.
Series / group context menu items reduced and moved others to "Advanced options" in separate sub menu.
Cleaned up naming and made it overall more consistent with other plugins like MP-TVseries.
Increased series plot to 4 rows for episode view in StreamedMP skin.
Series / group context menu items reduced and moved others to "Advanced options" in separate sub menu.
Update MPEI installer to remove obsolete MA3 files (.pdb / FFDShowAPI.dll).
Made home button action configure-able in settings.
Thumbnail custom path change and fix for certain view cases.
Updated project post script so that it no longer overwrites local plugin files / skin files making it easier to test MPEI installer.
Not consistently using proper series / group title.
Calender Does Not Go Past October 15th.
Characters Do Not Show.
Not All Relations Are Shown and String Issue.
Seiyuu Does Not Show.
Series Info Window Not Populating Correctly.
Fixed displaying of anime series info and images (fanart / poster) via context menu.
Fix FFDShowSettings no detection on web streams.
Fixed context menu commands "Mark all previous as Watch / Unwatched".
Fixed local thumbnail loading.
Fixed inconsistency in group name list display and sorting for groups with single series (non-grouped ones).
Fixed Streaming not playing bug.
Removed obsolete skins from project post script.
Removed all duplicated nodes from StreamedMP skin files.
Enable/Disable Streaming Option Removed.
Removed excess Titan (Extended) images and plugin debug files (.pdb).
Removed single group series name setting to avoid inconsistent naming.
Added 2 new mapped remote keys (RED = toggle mode / BLUE = toggle start word).
Allow turning off of keyboard hook when entering Anime3_Main (MA3) as an option.
Keyboard hook replaced with native Mediaportal method.
MPEI installer now overrides plugin files always in case of incorrect local file dates.
'Continue Watching' from 'Menu' gone in My Anime 3 - 3.6.
Going back pages to quickly in MA3 will crash Media Portal.
Something Random Shows No Results.
Anime3 start page (Titan) has no text background, is hard to read.
Cleaned up MPEI folder and fixed all paths.
Skip processing default toggle full screen video key if video is playing.
Titan skin update (categories to tags).
Restored StreamedMP Skin.
Plugin Version
Added caching of collection for faster loading
Added ability to stream collection
UI config option local thumbnail loading and image loading enhancements
Local thumbnail support for episodes
Changing find (search) setting in config to zero prevents ma3 from working
No art from themoviedb
Update MA3 to support MediaPortal 1.9
StreamedMP has updated skin design dimensions to 1920x1080
Keyboard hook is producing messaging events on a disposed form
